name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peer: A sidebar that connects off-chain platforms to ZKP2P

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preserve privacy while porting data from various platforms for use in ZKP2P

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peer is a browser companion that enables data provenance without compromising privacy. ZKP2P is a decentralized and privacy preserving P2P marketplace for transacting any digital asset on the internet. ZKP2P and Peer combine to serve as interface to the TLSNotary protocol which enables users to export data securely from any supported integration.
